idea:
MeeHelp is building a Mobile app for users to locate nearby maids/cooks for their real time needs. Our product will be technology platform that will search/match users request with the nearby providers. 


The Product will one, remove the intermediary contact and connect the users directly with providers. Second, it will solve the daily challenge of Indian households of finding a verified/trained and trusted domestic help quickly to complete the chores.


Finding Real time domestic help in India when you need it is significantly challenging besides being expensive if opting for local brokers's help. We as founders face it frequently every month and so do our friends and family. We decided to test our hypothesis and conducted a survey. The results were strongly in favor to have a tech solution for this growing and mandatory to solve problem.  


Anu left his banking job and worked for a year in 2019 at a startup where he built the service team and drove growth. The team is bringing a realistic solution to an unaddressed area. Each one of us understands service business from our experiences (banking, operations, customer experience, sales) and what can be done to fill the existing gap.  


More than 95 % of the interviewed people agreed that finding domestic help urgently is becoming a growing challenge and are definitely seeking solutions around it. 


The Feedback from domestic helps was also encouraging as even they were looking for a platform that can give them the flexibility of selecting the time slot and the area to provide services besides helping them make extra money.
name: MeeHelp
